mapper.update: update sku_attr_ref set sku_id = #{skuId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, sku_attr_id = #{skuAttrId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, app_id = #{appId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, created_time = #{createdTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, updated_time = #{updatedTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where ref_id = #{refId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select ref_id, sku_id, sku_attr_id, app_id, created_time, updated_time from sku_attr_ref
